attributes.action: Proclaim that the prime aim of any goverment is to listen to the expressed needs of its people and to carry out the people's wishes according to those expressed needs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Government is there only to enact the wishes of its people. Governement is not there to carry out an agenda of its own. Representative democracy in the UK has moved too far away from the prime aim of servicing the needs of the society it represents. Sometimes there is a need to 're-start' the system. This proclamation would provide this.
